dcterms:description: The i2b2-2010 clinical relation extraction challenge dataset was collected from three different hospitals and manually annotated by medical practitioners for identifying problems, treatments, and tests, along with eight relation types among them.
dcterms:title: i2b2-2010 clinical relation extraction challenge dataset

dcterms:description: The EU-ADR corpus contains annotated drugs, diseases, targets, and their relationships, which can be used for various biomedical informatics tasks.
dcterms:title: EU-ADR dataset
